azurerm_logic_app_trigger_recurrence.description: Manages a Recurrence Trigger within a Logic App Workflow

name.description: Specifies the name of the Recurrence Triggers to be created within the Logic App Workflow. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
name.notes: This name must be unique across all Triggers within the Logic App Workflow.

logic_app_id.description: Specifies the ID of the Logic App Workflow. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

frequency.description: Specifies the Frequency at which this Trigger should be run. Possible values include `Month`, `Week`, `Day`, `Hour`, `Minute` and `Second`.

interval.description: Specifies interval used for the Frequency, for example a value of `4` for `interval` and `hour` for `frequency` would run the Trigger every 4 hours.

start_time.description: Specifies the start date and time for this trigger in RFC3339 format: `2000-01-02T03:04:05Z`.

id.description: The ID of the Recurrence Trigger within the Logic App Workflow.

create.description: Used when creating the Logic App Recurrence Trigger.

update.description: Used when updating the Logic App Recurrence Trigger.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Logic App Recurrence Trigger.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Logic App Recurrence Trigger.
